statements: SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory;
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_color = 'red';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_type = 'shirt' ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_type, item_size, item_color FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_color IN ('blue', 'green');
SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC, item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_type = 'Shirt';
SELECT item_name, item_color, quantity FROM clothing_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_type, quantity FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_color = 'Blue' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_color, item_size FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_size IS NOT NULL ORDER BY item_color ASC, item_name DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_size, item_color FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'S%' AND item_color IN ('Red', 'Green') ORDER BY item_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items;
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM clothing_items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, price FROM clothing_items WHERE item_category = 'Shoes' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM accessories WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT accessory_name, price FROM accessories WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items WHERE item_category = 'Shirts';
SELECT item_name, item_category, price FROM clothing_items WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT accessory_name, quantity FROM accessories WHERE price < 50 AND accessory_type = 'Belts' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT item_category FROM clothing_items;
SELECT item_name, item_category, quantity, price FROM clothing_items WHERE price between 20 AND 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC, price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Clothing_Items;
SELECT item_name, color FROM Clothing_Items WHERE category='Shirts';
SELECT * FROM Accessories ORDER BY accessory_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT item_id, category, size, color FROM Clothing_Items WHERE size='M' AND category='Pants';
SELECT * FROM Clothing_Items WHERE category='Shirts' AND color='Blue';
SELECT item_id, item_name, category FROM Clothing_Items WHERE color='Red' ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, color FROM Clothing_Items WHERE category='Pants' ORDER BY color ASC;

SELECT c.item_name, a.accessory_name, i.quantity FROM Clothing_Items c INNER JOIN Accessories a ON c.item_id = a.item_id INNER JOIN Inventory i ON c.item_id = i.item_id WHERE c.category='Dresses' AND a.material='Silk' ORDER BY i.quantity DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM Clothing_Items;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items;
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM clothing_items WHERE price > 50;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM clothing_items ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM accessories WHERE material = 'Leather';
SELECT accessory_name, price FROM accessories WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items WHERE category = 'shirts';
SELECT item_id, item_name, price FROM clothing_items WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM item_categories JOIN clothing_items ON item_categories.category_id = clothing_items.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT accessory_name, material, quantity FROM accessories WHERE price < 100 AND quantity > 0 LIMIT 3;
SELECT item_name, quantity_sold, sold_date FROM inventory_tracking JOIN clothing_items ON inventory_tracking.item_id = clothing_items.item_id WHERE sold_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM Clothing_Items;
SELECT item_name, item_category, price FROM Clothing_Items WHERE price > 50;
SELECT accessory_name, accessory_type, price FROM Accessories WHERE price < 30 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, size, color FROM Clothing_Items WHERE color='Blue' AND size='M';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM Clothing_Items WHERE item_category = 'Shirts';
SELECT item_name, color, price FROM Clothing_Items WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY color ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_category, price FROM Clothing_Items WHERE size = 'M' AND color = 'Blue';
SELECT * FROM Accessories WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.quantity, Product_Listings.price, Clothing_Items.item_name FROM Orders JOIN Product_Listings ON Orders.listing_id = Product_Listings.listing_id JOIN Clothing_Items ON Product_Listings.item_id = Clothing_Items.item_id WHERE quantity >= 3 AND total_cost < 200 ORDER BY total_cost ASC;
